ModMetaData.name: LMC057.医疗训练
ModMetaData.author: ItchyFlea
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Lets you train your doctors by dissecting the corpses of your friends and enemies. 让你通过解剖朋友和敌人的尸体来训练你的医生。 Updated for 1.0 Credits: ============ ItchyFlea: Mod Creator Kylie "Shadowtajun" Halley: Texture Artist
